name: tillywork
tagline: A collaborative project and task management platform
description: Tillywork is a self-hosted project and task management platform inspired by modern work tools. It supports boards, timelines, comments, and integrations, providing teams a focused environment to collaborate.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create detailed tasks with descriptions, assignees, due dates, and custom fields

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Collaborate on tasks with threaded comments and mentions for team communication

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with external tools and services through webhooks and API integrations

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Define custom statuses and workflows that match your team's processes

features.title: File Attachments
features.description: Attach documents and files to tasks for centralized project documentation
